DOC.brief_summary: This study compare brain uptake 18F- DTBZ 20 patient PD , 20 patient MSA , 20 patient PSP , 20 patient CBS , 20 patient VaP , 20 patient ET , 10 patient DT .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Novel Imaging Biomarker Differential Diagnosis Parkinson 's Disease Parkinsonism
DOC.detailed_description: Study duration expect completed period 4 year . This study uncontrolled , open-label , non-randomized , parallel , cross-sectional study . Total 130 subject , include 20 patient PD , 20 patient MSA , 20 patient PSP , 20 patient CBS , 20 patient VaP , 20 patient ET , 10 patient DT , enrol . Each evaluable subject involve study must fulfill inclusion exclusion criterion accord subject grouping , subject 3 visit study , one screening visit , one imaging visit , one safety evaluation visit . Safety measurement evaluate medical history , vital sign , physical examination , laboratory examination collect adverse event .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Twenty subject diagnosis PD must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil `` UK Parkinson 's Disease Society Brain Bank Criteria Diagnosis PD '' ( Appendix I ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 2 . Twenty subject diagnosis MSA must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil Consensus diagnostic criterion `` possible '' `` probable '' MSA14 ( Appendix I ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 3 . Twenty subject diagnosis PSP must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil NINDSSPSP clinical criterion diagnosis PSP `` possible '' `` probable '' PSP55 ( Appendix III ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 4 . Twenty subject diagnosis CBS must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil '' Mayo Clinic propose criterion diagnosis corticobasal syndrome '' 56 ( Appendix I ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 5 . Twenty subject diagnosis VaP must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil clinical diagnostic criterion vascular parkinsonism . ( Appendix I ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 6 . Twenty subject diagnosis ET must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil `` The Consensus Criteria MDS Essential Tremor '' 30 . ( Appendix I ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 7 . Ten subject diagnosis DT must : . Male female patient , age range 20~80 . ii . Patients fulfil `` The Consensus Criteria MDS Dystonic Tremor '' 30 . ( Appendix I ) . iii . Patients provide write informed consent prior study entry . If patient incapable informed consent , caregiver may consent behalf patient ( patient must still confirm assent ) . 1 . Pregnant become pregnant study ( documented pregnancy test screen date study accord PI discretion ) current breast feeding.. 2 . Any subject clinically significant abnormal laboratory value , and/or clinically significant unstable medical psychiatric illness . i. Clinically significant hepatic , renal , pulmonary , metabolic , endocrine disturbance . ii . Current clinically significant cardiovascular disease . ( cardiac surgery myocardial infarction within last 6 month ; unstable angina ; decompensated congestive heart failure ; significant cardiac arrhythmia ; congenital heart disease . 3 . History drug alcohol abuse within last year , prior prolonged history abuse . 4 . History presence QTc prolongation . 5 . History intracranial operation , include thalamotomy , pallidotomy , and/or deep brain stimulation . 6 . Any documented abnormality brain CT MRI brain , might contribute motor function , hydrocephalus encephalomalacia , exclude . Mild cortical atrophy nonspecific white matter change allow . 7 . Patients evidence secondary parkinsonism neurodegenerative disease , spinocerellar atrophy ( SCA ) , Wilson 's disease , hydrocephalus , serious head injury definite history neurotoxin exposure , exclude . 8 . History allergy radioligands contain 18F isotope .
